extendedInfo.description: In 2020, T viruses spread all over the world. A large number of people are infected with viruses T and become zombies. You are one of the survivors. You are involved in the war against the zombies. FEATURES:âEnjoy shocking music and sound effect!âExperience the sensation of firing wildly!âKill different kinds of zombies!âNew weapons and upgrade system!âChallenging role growth system!âNew and unique bonus items!

reviews.title: AMAZING
reviews.comment: I love this game its fun and awesome sometimes once in awhile ill get a forse close but the game is fun anazing an speeds time up for sure
reviews.author: Charlene Walton

reviews.comment: Wow,  I love this game its user friendly and very addictive.  Thanks guyz keep it up with the good work.
reviews.author: mamse103

reviews.title: Awesome game. can\'t wait to play the new one. This is great:-)
reviews.comment: Tottaly love this game. Zombies are my favort;-)
reviews.author: Elisabeth Robinson

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Superb game. Superb music. One of the best i have played in ages.
reviews.author: Praveen Sharma

reviews.title: Good time killer. Easy to play. Great game.
reviews.comment: Very easy to play. Easy to pick up and a great waste of time.
reviews.author: Kyle Buckheister

reviews.comment: Fun! Fun! Fun! Just wish I was able to move around a lil bit. But its still Fun.
reviews.author: Martin Brown

reviews.title: Not Happy
reviews.comment: I just spent $9.99 for 300 gold and received 0 gold. Either give me my gold or give me my money back. You shouldn\'t pull money out of my account but not give me what I am owed.  Pretty sure this is a good reason not to play or BUY things from this app......
reviews.author: Carrie Lewis

reviews.title: Fun and addictive.
reviews.comment: I like to play this game during commercial breaks and while i\'m waiting for my food in the microwave. Lol
reviews.author: Cliff Henriquez

reviews.title: Unsatisfied
reviews.comment: It would be a cool game if it didn\'t cost a small fortune in REAL $$$$ to keep playing after higher levels are reached. It\'s like it strings you along until WOOPS!!! I can\'t advance anymore unless I spend MY $$$$ for better weapons and stuff.  I uninstalled it for this reason.
reviews.author: Andrew Anido

reviews.title: Awsome!
reviews.comment: This game is awsome! Just need better coin rewards, but hey just go to tap joy and earn more coins. I do.
reviews.author: Taydren Moore

reviews.title: Efficient and fun.
reviews.comment: I think its an overall good game. I bet having a smaller screen would make it tough to play. But I\'m fine with my screen.
reviews.author: Patric Rawson

reviews.comment: I have been waiting for this.  Fun, engaging, and doesn\'t drain my sensitive battery.\tAwesome fun!
reviews.author: Rusty McLouth

reviews.title: Super Nice Game...
reviews.comment: Really nice game, Love it. Well done guys
reviews.author: Tollen Jackson

reviews.comment: The game itself is good but the free gold offers are BS. You spend hours filling out stuff, and don\'t get the gold when your finished. The very first time I got my gold and not even once since...I even found and purchased health insurance but never received my 543 gold that I was supposed to receive after getting only quotes, and I did that, then even made a purchase and NOTHING.!!! Arg. I want my gold please :-/  one star...until I get my gold.
reviews.author: Nathan Porter

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: The only problem I have is it gets really hard after a few levels of play. Other than that I love the game!
reviews.author: Kayla Mongar

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy S2
reviews.comment: Very addictive game, but the last update I think made the game even harder to win. And we have buy some items to win if you complete certain level.
reviews.author: Ghani Rizqi

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Need to make a open world zombie killing game. But this game is awesome. Love it. Five stars
reviews.author: Tyler Busman

reviews.title: Just us chickens
reviews.comment: Its an alright game till you hit level seven.  After that just uninstall unless you plan on spending money.  Pretty much any advancement through the game is brought to a screeching halt.
reviews.author: Larry Bentley

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love this game:-) I honstly could not put it down, a lil too easy but really fun
reviews.author: Charles Ayala

reviews.comment: I like it but it stalls due to me having trouble with game play on my small screen and large fingers
reviews.author: flanagan D
